column2: Perhaps Joe is not lost after all, he said.
column3: Perhaps Joe is not lost after all, he said.

column2: Oh, he's just the lad to get safely out of the scrape, I repeat.	Oh, he's just the lad to get safely out of the scrape, I repeat.
I hope so.	I hope so.
He found that there were still left some thirty pounds of pemmican, a supply of tea and coffee, about a gallon and a half of brandy, and one empty water-tank.
column3: He found that there were still left some thirty pounds of pemmican, a supply of tea and coffee, about a gallon and a half of brandy, and one empty water tank.

column2: All the dried meat had disappeared.
column3: All the dried meat had disappeared.

column2: The dilating apparatus appeared to be in good condition, and neither the battery nor the spiral had been injured.
column3: The dilating apparatus appeared to be in good condition, and neither the battery nor the spiral had been injured.

column2: At the first streak of day, the doctor aroused Kennedy.	At the first streak of day, the doctor aroused Kennedy.
Let us set out, then! said the hunter.
column3: Let us set out, then! said the hunter.

column2: We cannot be far away from the scene of our accident."
column3: We cannot be far away from the scene of our accident."

column2: We must absolutely come to a halt, said he, "and even alight.
column3: We must absolutely come to a halt, said he, "and even alight.

column2: One horrible thought glanced across the minds of both Kennedy and the doctor: caymans swarm in these waters!
column3: One horrible thought glanced across the minds of both Kennedy and the doctor: caymans swarm in these waters!
